posts.post_content:
Time to thin out the collection a bit.  I have the following cards available.  Am willing to listen to counter offers but honestly I don’t have patience for lowball offers....all grades are PSA unless noted:   I’ll work on adding asking prices soon. 

Cy Young Glove shows - Tolstoi 4.5.  Presents like a strong EX+ to ExMt but there is a noticeable small spot of (tobacco?) staining on top border.  $4000 now $3900 now $3800

Warhop batting - Carolina Brights 4 - solid card.  Sold

McGraw Glove at Hip - Red Hindu 1.5 - noticeable crease - strong clean back - $2000 now $1900 now $1850

Mullen “Mullin” BroadLeaf 350 - 2 - accurately graded, clean reverse.  Sold

Jennings Both Hands - AB 350 NF - 6MC - very strong card almost no border on right hand side ... typical for AB.  $995 now $925

Clancy - AB 350 Frame - 6MC - near perfect centering on the front, back is somewhat OC - resubmit candidate - $325

Irv Young - AB 350 Frame - 4.5.  Not sure what PSA didn’t like here presents nicer. 1 of 1 in grade w/ one higher.  Sold

Huggins Hands at Mouth - AB 350 Frame - 3.5. Accurately graded. Clean reverse.  1 of 2 in that grade w/ one higher $450 now $425

Brown Washington - Sov 350 - 4.  $650 now $635

Russ Ford - Sov 460 - 3.  Imo overgraded.  Spot of paper loss on the front.   $70 now $68 now $66

mcGann - Cycle 350 - 4 - sold
Maddox - Cycle 350 - SGC 40/3 - surface wrinkle but otherwise nice.  $225 now $220

F. Jones hands at side - RAW - Brown Hindu.  Best guess is VG+ Maybe VgEx on a good day. No creases but rounded corners. $595.  Last PSA 4 went for over $1k




Email: [url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url] if interested
Very nice list. Any chance of seeing scans?

I have pics of all the cards - but can never seem to get an upload to work on Net54.  I’m also unavailable until Monday - so I sincerely apologize to all for the significant delay.  

Email is [url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
